name: Tetrabot
description:
Made for the GGJ 2020

Tetrabot is a coop puzzle battle-game where two player will build they're own star ship with tetromino and then battle to the death in the space arena !

Game made by :

Corentin Job : Programmer and Game Designer

Simon Picardat : Programmer and Game Designer

Aurélien Mary : Programmer and Game Designer

Côme Richetta : Game Designer

Samuel Lauro : Game Artist

Aubane Rittano : FX artist

Sarocha Phansart : Game Artist 

TIPS : it's required to play with two xbox controller to experience the game.
